jobs.title: Accountant (m/w/d)
jobs.description:
Honest Food ist Europas führende „Ghost Restaurant“ Kette und Teil von Delivery Hero. Alle unsere virtuellen Restaurantmarken wurden speziell für die Lieferung entwickelt und können ausschließlich über Online Plattformen gekauft werden. Unsere Marken werden über unser Netzwerk aus digital optimierten Partner Restaurants flächendeckend angeboten und unter strengsten Qualitätsvorgaben gekocht und ausgeliefert.

Unser Ziel - Die perfekte Kundenerfahrung beim Bestellen von Lieferessen für jeden Haushalt, jederzeit. 

Seit unserer Gründung Anfang 2017 haben wir Tag und Nacht daran gearbeitet, Honest Food zu einer der schnellst wachsenden Foodtech-Unternehmen Europas zu machen.

Zur Verstärkung unseres Teams im Berliner Office suchen wir zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt einen Accountant (m/w/d), um unsere Erfolgsgeschichte fortzuschreiben.



Deine Aufgaben:
- Du **kontrollierst und verarbeitest alle Eingangsrechnungen** : u.a. Steuerung des Freigabeprozesses mit den Budget Managern, Belegverarbeitung in DATEV sowie der Vorkontierung
- Du **kommunizierst mit externen Steuerberatern und Buchhaltern**
- Du kontrollierst die Bargeldeinnahmen von unseren Partner-Restaurants, überprüfst die Rechnungen und behebst Diskrepanzen mit den lokalen Operations Managern
- Weiterhin überprüfst Du Kontoauszüge, gleichst die monatliche Kreditkartenrechnungen ab und bearbeitest monatliche Reisekostenabrechnungen
- Unseren Head of Finance unterstützt Du bei Reportings für betriebswirtschaftliche Auswertungen und Jahresabschlüsse
- Du unterstützt bei der **Einführung und Umsetzung neuer Finanzprozesse und IT-Anwendungen**
- Du pflegst die Stammdaten von Lieferanten, Partner-Restaurants und Produkten in unsere IT-Systeme ein.


Dein Profil:
- Du kannst ein wirtschaftswissenschaftliches Studium oder eine kaufmännische Ausbildung als Steuerfachangestellter oder Buchhalter vorweisen
- Darauf aufbauend **mindestens 2 Jahre Berufserfahrung**
- Du hast eine hohe Affinität zu Zahlen und **gute Kenntnisse in Excel** ; Vorerfahrung mit DATEV (insbesondere Unternehmen Online) ist ein plus
- Du arbeitest detailorientiert, weist ein überdurchschnittliches Organisationstalent auf und die Fähigkeit mehrere Aufgaben mit verschiedenen Deadlines gleichzeitig und termingerecht zu bearbeiten
- Neben **fließende Deutschkenntnisse** , kannst Du auch **gute Englischkenntnisse** vorweisen
- Drive, Hands-on Mentalität und eine positive Einstellung runden Dein Profil ab.


Was wir bieten:
- Revolutioniere eine schnell wachsende Industrie und bereichere die Food Deliveries weltweit
- Wir geben dir die Chance großen Einfluss auf die Erfolgsgeschichte unseres Unternehmen zu haben und die Möglichkeit der Mitgestaltung eines innovativen Geschäftsmodells in der Food Tech Branche
- Ownership, ein einzigartiges Arbeitsumfeld mit viel Gestaltungsspielraum und einer ausgezeichneten Kultur
- Eine steile Lernkurve sowie die stetige Weiterentwicklung durch diverse Trainingsmaßnahmen.


Haben wir dein Interesse geweckt? Dann freuen wir uns auf deine Bewerbung! 

Falls Du derzeit keinen Lebenslauf zur Hand hast, kannst Du uns auch gerne den Link zu deinem aussagekräfigen LinkedIn Profil schicken.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager (m/f/d)
jobs.description:
Honest Food is Europe’s leading „Ghost Restaurant“ chain - parent company to the most beloved and successful food delivery brands on the continent and part of the Delivery Hero Group. All our virtual restaurant brands are developed specifically for delivery and can only be purchased through online platforms. Our family of digitally optimized partner restaurants prepare the food with the highest attention to detail to make sure that each household in every region can enjoy the perfect food delivery experience at any time. 
 
Since the company’s foundation in 2017, we’ve worked hard to become one of Europe’s fastest growing companies in food tech. Whilst a lot has been achieved already, we are hungrier than ever to completely change the rules of global food delivery. We believe that highly motivated and talented people are the key to master our ambitious goals ahead. 
Join our team now, we are hiring the best talent on every position.

To exponentially grow our company and explore new markets and areas of business, we are hiring a Business Development Manager, who will directly report to our founders.

As Business Development Manager you are part of our internal special force that works on the most important strategic projects across all departments in our business - you are a core driver of growth. 

Examples of such projects are:

Business model & product innovation projects
- Launch independent new business initiatives within the company to increase share of value chain
- Build out minimum viable product, launch, improve and hire new teams
- End-to-end responsibility for new products and process innovations.

Business analytics projects
- Spec new IT tools and implement with tech team, measure against KPIs
- Improve performance controlling systems and processes for our restaurant partners and roll them out end-to-end (logistics, incident rates, cash, quality)
- Analysis and evaluation of market, competition and trend-data to optimize business processes with local teams.

Expansion projects
- Lead the process of building new production facilities on a new continent, staff the right contractors and suppliers, build legal foundation, implement processes, communicate with local management
- Hire new teams, build playbooks.


Your profile:
- Top of the line analytical skills, paired with hands-on growth mentality
- Strength in quantitative analysis with Excel, if possible Power BI/ Tableau
- Detail orientation, and ability to juggle multiple tasks and conflicting deadlines at once
- Top-notch organizational skills and high process affinity
- Leadership and communication skills to lead implementation efforts
- Above average university degree in business administration from top-tier university
- Relevant professional experience in fast-paced dynamic business environments.


What we offer:
- Revolutionize one of the rapidly developing industries and enrich food deliveries worldwide
- Opportunity to have real impact on the success story of the company and significantly shape one of the fastest growing consumer brand companies in food tech with massive public exposure
- An energetic, positive, self-managed work environment with a team culture that prizes excellence and commitment to our company mission
- High potential for personal growth and fast career development.


In case you don't have a CV at hand, you can also apply with your compelling LinkedIn profile. 

Ready to become part of Honest Food’s Business Development team? We are looking forward to meeting you!

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Honest Food Company is Europe’s leading chain of “Ghost Restaurants”. 
We aim to innovate & disrupt the online food delivery industry by running a rapidly growing network of delivery-only restaurants that prepare healthy, made-for-delivery food in major European markets.

Honest Food Company based in Berlin, Germany with it’s development studio being located in Goa, India. Our development team in Goa is seeking to add a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with experience in Node (Koa/Express), React, React Mobile and PHP (Symfony) to its ranks.

This position will be trusted with solving challenges across all our IT projects, namely our ecommerce shop and our other web and mobile applications as well as supporting microservices.


Requirements

Minimum 5 years of development experience of working on frontend and backend projects in both web and mobile
Proficient with JavaScript, Node, PHP, HTML5 and CSS3
Experience with Koa, Express, Symfony and React frameworks
Knowledge of cloud architectures and deployments, AWS, GCP, Heroku and Serverless concepts
Experience in designing Rest APIs and RPC structures
Experience working with SQL and NoSQL databases
A preoccupation with staying on top of industry trends and technologies 
Team player able to multi-task, work with minimal supervision, and a willingness to help team members 
Strong analytical skills and the ability to evaluate data to enhance decision-making
Ability to operate in an agile production environment


Responsibilities


Build e-commerce, web and mobile applications
Maintaining existing code across all platforms
Plan and execute new projects together with a team of developers
Analyze, design, code, debug, test, document & deploy applications.
Understand and support e-commerce and ERP data organization and relationships, including store catalogs (categories, products, attributes) and custom product configurators. 
Work with common third-party API's and create API’s of our own
Troubleshoot & optimize performance of UI and backend components
Make sure that high-quality standards are met
Design, build and maintain efficient, reusable and reliable code
Think outside the box and suggest innovative solutions to challenging problems

About Us

The Honest Food Company is Europe's leading "Ghost Restaurant" chain. We are revolutionizing the market for online food delivery. Ghost Restaurants are our digitally optimized delivery kitchens from which we ship food designed specifically for delivery under different brands - with no guest room and without the drawbacks of a classic restaurant. Customers can order online exclusively through our own websites and through delivery platforms such as Foodora and Deliveroo.

Amazing Perks

Challenging tasks
Awesome sea-view office
Table tennis, arcade machine, pool table
Intellectual exchange & satisfaction
Relaxed dress code, coconuts & palm trees
Free coffee, because how else are you going to pound away at the keyboard all day?

jobs.title: Head of People (m/f/d)
jobs.description:
Honest Food is Europe’s leading „Ghost Restaurant“ chain - parent company to the most beloved and successful food delivery brands on the continent and part of the Delivery Hero Group. All our virtual restaurant brands are developed specifically for delivery and can only be purchased through online platforms. Our family of digitally optimized partner restaurants prepare the food with the highest attention to detail to make sure that each household in every region can enjoy the perfect food delivery experience at any time. 
 
Since the company’s foundation in 2017, we’ve worked hard to become one of Europe’s fastest growing companies in food tech. Whilst a lot has been achieved already, we are hungrier than ever to completely change the rules of global food delivery. We believe that highly motivated and talented people are the key to master our ambitious goals ahead. 
Join our team now, we are hiring the best talent on every position.

To further grow our business internationally, we are hiring a Head of People (m/f/d) that continues to build and retain the best team in the world.


Your position:
- Lead our People team and be responsible for recruiting, onboarding, company culture, communication, payroll, learning & development, and performance management
- Develop and implement career development programs and performance management with suitable incentive schemes for each function and each seniority level
- Build and foster a unique company culture with an outstanding employer branding
- Further development and optimization of the recruiting strategy and processes
- Implement an internal feedback process to continuously improve team performance across functions
- Lead internal communication and knowledge exchange processes between teams and departments
- Align with Delivery Hero counterparts on strategy, processes & tools to leverage synergies for our People function
- Continuously develop the company org structure (roles & responsibilities, reporting lines, etc.) and team structures based on company stage, current feedback and learnings


Your profile:
- Strong leadership and communication skills with experience in building and managing international teams
- Strong analytical skills, paired with hands-on growth mentality and a positive, enthusiastic entrepreneurial mindset
- Very experienced in understanding and shaping organizational processes with the ability to see the big picture, while deep diving into sub-processes
- Above average university degree in business administration, psychology, sociology or equivalant
- 5+ years of professional experience, proven track record in similar position
- Fluency in English and German


What we offer:
- Opportunity to significantly shape one of the fastest-growing consumer brand companies in food tech with massive public exposure
- High potential for personal growth and fast career development
- Steep learning curve and direct work in strategic projects with Honest Food’s leadership team
- Best out of both worlds, start-up spirit and speed, packed by the worlds largest food delivery platform
- Dynamic, fast-paced environment and an amazing, passionate team in the heart of Berlin
- Free food and drinks - after all, we are in the food business
- Attractive salary and benefits package


Ready to shape the future of online food delivery? We are looking forward to meeting you!

To exponentially grow our company and successfully conquer new markets with a scalable infrastructure, we are hiring a Head of Supply Chain who takes responsibility for the entire food supply chain.

Your tasks:

Food Supply Chain Management:
•	Build our supply chain team and manage procurement, production and logistics to ensure there is always the perfect level of inventory at each warehouse (central HUBs, regional HUBs, partner restaurants)
•	Develop an integrated supply chain strategy and ensure its rigorous execution to facilitate high growth at optimal cost
•	Lead our procurement for food and non-food articles: identify requirements and key suppliers, lead price negotiations, purchasing and cost control
•	Manage our proprietary food production (production planning, staffing strategy, cost control) and develop our long-term production strategy
•	Manage international logistics and regional logistics HUBs: define, control and dynamically optimize warehouse KPIs; supervise regional logistics managers and regional logistics to our partner restaurants (SOPs, tour planning, cash collection)

Cost & Working Capital Optimization:
•	Continuously control and optimize all cost along the entire supply chain (procurement, production, logistics) and lead make vs. buy decisions for each area of the supply chain
•	Optimize inventory for minimum working capital requirement

International Expansion:
•	Prepare the supply chain for international expansion; set up international and regional logistics, recruit and manage local teams
•	Grow our proprietary food production facility to provide supply for 10x volume within 12 months


Your profile:
- Top of the line analytical & quantitative skills, paired with hands-on growth mentality
- Strong leadership and communication skills with experience in building and managing international teams
- Top-notch organizational skills and high process affinity
- High attention to detail and ability to juggle multiple tasks and conflicting deadlines at once
- Entrepreneurial mindset and business sense to make things happen
- Above average university degree in business administration from top-tier university
- 5+ years of professional experience, thereof 2+ years in management consulting or proven track record in similar position


What we offer:
- Revolutionize one of the rapidly developing industries and enrich food deliveries worldwide
- Opportunity to have real impact on the success story of the company and significantly shape one of the fastest growing consumer brand companies in food tech with massive public exposure
- An energetic, positive, self-managed work environment with a team culture that prizes excellence and commitment to our company mission
- High potential for personal growth and fast career development

jobs.title: Sales Manager - Austria (m/w/d)
jobs.description:
Honest Food ist Europas führende „Ghost Restaurant“ Kette - Mutterfirma der beliebtesten und erfolgreichsten Lieferrestaurantmarken des Kontinents und Teil von Delivery Hero. Alle unsere virtuellen Restaurantmarken wurden speziell für die Lieferung entwickelt und können ausschließlich über Online Plattformen gekauft werden.
Unsere Marken werden über unser Netzwerk aus digital optimierten Partner Restaurants flächendeckend angeboten und unter strengsten Qualitätsvorgaben gekocht und ausgeliefert.

Unser Ziel: Die perfekte Kundenerfahrung beim Bestellen von Lieferessen für jeden Haushalt, jederzeit. 

Seit unserer Gründung Anfang 2017 haben wir Tag und Nacht daran gearbeitet Honest Food zu einer der schnellst wachsenden Foodtech Firmen Europas zu machen. Wir haben viel erreicht, aber weiterhin große Ziele - werde jetzt Teil unseres Teams und schreibe die Erfolgsgeschichte gemeinsam mit uns fort.

Um unser Netzwerk an Partner Restaurants noch stärker zu erweitern und wirklich jeden Haushalt in den Genuss unserer Marken kommen zu lassen, suchen wir für Österreich zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt einen Sales Manager (m/w/d) um gemeinsam mit uns die Erfolgsgeschichte fortzuschreiben.  
 
Gemeinsam revolutionieren wir den Markt für Online Food Delivery!


Deine Aufgaben:
- Du begeisterst und gewinnst Restaurants innerhalb deiner Region für eine Partnerschaft mit uns
- Du bist verantwortlich für sämtliche Verhandlungen mit den Entscheidungsträgern der Partnerrestaurants und erläuterst denen unseren Mehrwert
- Du beobachtest kontinuierlich den Markt sowie diverse Trends und baust mit den evaluierten Daten deinen Markt weiter aus
- Du bist für den gesamten Vertriebsprozess verantwortlich - vom Erstkontakt bis zur Vertragsunterzeichnung 
- Du trägst die Ownership für die Strukturierung deiner Sales Prozesse und arbeitest Hand in Hand mit unserem Operations Team.


Dein Profil:
- Mehrjährige Berufserfahrung im Vertrieb - Erfahrungen in der Lebensmittelindustrie oder in der Gastronomie sind ein Plus, aber nicht notwendig
- Du bist extrem kommunikationsstark und kannst jeden noch so skeptischen Partner von unserem Mehrwert überzeugen
- Du legst einen enormen Drive an den Tag und kannst deine Begeisterung und Energie auf andere übertragen
- Durch dein souveräners Auftreten hinterlässt du einen starken Eindruck bei den Partnern
- Du weißt wie du immer das maximale aus deiner Region herausholen kannst und dabei die besten Partner an Bord holst
- Es ist dir wichtig flexibel in deiner Region unterwegs zu sein und deinen Tag eigenständig zu planen.


Was wir bieten:
- Revolutioniere eine schnell wachsende Industrie und bereichere die Food Deliveries weltweit
- Wir geben dir die Chance großen Einfluss auf die Erfolgsgeschichte unseres Unternehmen zu haben und die Möglichkeit der Mitgestaltung eines innovativen Geschäftsmodells in der Food Tech Branche
- Ownership, ein einzigartiges Arbeitsumfeld mit viel Gestaltungsspielraum und einer ausgezeichneten Kultur 
- Eine steile Lernkurve sowie die stetige Weiterentwicklung durch diverse Trainingsmaßnahmen.


Haben wir Dein Interesse geweckt? Dann freuen wir uns Dich kennenzulernen.

Falls Du derzeit keinen Lebenslauf zur Hand hast, kannst Du uns auch gerne den Link zu deinem aussagekräfigen LinkedIn Profil schicken.
